lyricsEng: How much longer will I have to go on like this?
I wonder if I'm going to be alone
I hate myself more and more
I've had a lot of love and a lot of affection until today
May this love come to fruition
A little bit more, a little bit more
I feel like I've become stronger
Until now, I've passed many nights
I don't know, I don't know
I'm going to tell you now
I wish I'd never fallen in love
At that time, on that night,
May this love come to fruition
A little bit more, a little bit more
